name: highwayhasher
description: HighwayHash implementation for both node and browsers

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:wasm-simd && npm run build:native && npm run build:bundle
scripts.compressed-size: npm run build && find dist -iname '*.js' -exec npx terser@latest --compress --mangle --output {} -- {} \;
scripts.optimize: wasm-opt -Os src/main/wasm/highwayhasher_wasm_bg.wasm -o tmp.wasm && mv tmp.wasm src/main/wasm/highwayhasher_wasm_bg.wasm && wasm-opt --enable-simd -Os src/main/wasm-simd/highwayhasher_wasm_simd_bg.wasm -o tmp.wasm && mv tmp.wasm src/main/wasm-simd/highwayhasher_wasm_simd_bg.wasm
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:inplace
scripts.test:inplace: npm run test:native && npm run test:types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run optimize && ./assets/download-releases.sh && npm run build:bundle

author: Nick Babcock <nbabcock19@hotmail.com>
